Container.Name: LibreChat
Container.Overview:
LibreChat: Enhanced ChatGPT Clone. Features: Agents, Anthropic, AWS, OpenAI, Azure, Gemini, AI model switching, message search, langchain, DALL-E-3, Multi-User Auth, and more.
[b]PREREQUISITES:[/b] 1. You must have a MongoDB container running (e.g., the official mongo docker). 2. You must generate random hex strings for the CREDS_KEY, CREDS_IV, and JWT_SECRET below, or logins will fail.
[b]CONFIGURATION:[/b] - This template uses Environment Variables for config. - The 'librechat.yaml' file is optional and not mapped by default to prevent boot errors. If you need advanced configuration (custom endpoints), create the file on your server first, then add a Host Path mapping manually: /mnt/user/appdata/librechat/librechat.yaml -> /app/librechat.yaml

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: The port to access the LibreChat interface.

Config.Name: Client Domain
Config.Description: The URL used to access the app. MUST include http:// or https://.

Config.Name: Server Domain
Config.Description: Usually the same as Client Domain.

Config.Name: Crypto Key
Config.Description: Required. 64-character hex string. Run 'openssl rand -hex 32' to generate.

Config.Name: Crypto IV
Config.Description: Required. 32-character hex string. Run 'openssl rand -hex 16' to generate.

Config.Name: JWT Secret
Config.Description: Required. Long random string for signing tokens.

Config.Name: JWT Refresh Secret
Config.Description: Required. Long random string for refresh tokens.

Config.Name: OpenAI API Key
Config.Description: Optional. If set to 'user_provided', users can enter their own key in the UI.

Config.Name: Install MeiliSearch
Config.Description: Set to 'true' only if you have a separate MeiliSearch container running for chat history search.

Config.Name: MeiliSearch Key
Config.Description: The master key from your MeiliSearch container.
